Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionPhase
public class ActionPhase extends Object
Handling of Action Phase of the turn of the player

    • playCharacterCard

      protected void playCharacterCard(int choice) throws NotEnoughCoinsException, CardException
      Method for playing a character card in this turn
      Parameters:
      choice - CharacterCard to Play
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCoinsException - if the player doesn't have enough coins
      CardException - Exception caused by an invalid action upon playing the card

      choice - student to move
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if action is not possible.

      Parameters:
      studentChoice - student to move
      islandChoice - island destination of the pawn
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if action is not possible

      Parameters:
      stepsChoice - steps to move Mother Nature
      Throws:

      Throws:

    • extraAction

      protected void extraAction(int... values) throws Exception
      Extra action helper method when playing a character card: if the played character card requires an additional move, this method is invoked
      Parameters:
      values - options varying based on the action type
      Throws:
      Exception - if action is invalid

    • endAction

      protected void endAction()
      Ends this ActionPhase for the currentPlayer

    • isEnded

      protected boolean isEnded()
      Answers if there are additional actions in this ActionPhase that can be played
      Returns:
      true if no more actions are possible in this ActionPhase

      private void moveStudentCounter()
      Keeps count of the possible moves of the students in this ActionPhase, depending on the number of players in the model
